data.message: I was attempting to update my app and it said that one of the new features I need to accept is to allow facebook to read my text messages. Why do you need to read them? There is absolutely no need for you to have access to my text messages. Thanks for the years of entertainment but I'll decide how much personal information I share and I am not at all comfortable with the new settings.

replies.message: Hi Aimee. We hear your frustrations. You have the option to opt out of mobile texts and can adjust your settings by following these instructions: http://on.fb.me/1bxx70y -Natalie
